summary: Diff adds a TanStack Router multi-route React app with Internet Identity auth hook usage, React Query data hooks, brand CSS tokens/typography, and a Motoko backend skeleton with role types and job/application-related models. However, several BuildRequest items are either not evidenced in the diff (likely in omitted files) or show signs of placeholder/dummy wiring (notably in candidate/employer profile queries). Also includes a secret-token-based access-control initialization that was not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide the required UK silhouette SVG asset (uk-silhouette.dim_1200x800.svg) and implement the UK Map Hero SVG silhouette + nodes/lines/shimmer animations.
missing_requirements.reason: The required SVG asset file is not present in the added file list, and no UK map hero SVG implementation is evidenced in the shown files.
evidence: Added files list does not include uk-silhouette.dim_1200x800.svg

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure no “dummy/placeholder” data paths remain for backend-driven flows (profiles, jobs, applications, settings) and that frontend calls match real backend APIs.
missing_requirements.reason: The React Query hooks for candidate/employer profile retrieval explicitly use a placeholder approach (passing email 'as any' while commenting that backend uses caller), indicating non-final integration and likely mismatched API usage.
evidence: frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts ("return actor.getCandidateProfile(identity.email as any); // Using email as placeholder, backend uses caller")

hallucinated_features.description: Secret-token-based access-control initialization via URL parameter (caffeineAdminToken) and calling a backend method _initializeAccessControlWithSecret.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires Internet Identity auth and role-based authorization, but does not request any secret token URL parameter mechanism or hidden initialization method.

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai marketing/referral link in the footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies footer content (contact info + navigation links) but does not request third-party referral/attribution links.
